Amcor reached a 52 Week high at 11.78

Unlike other packaging names like WRK have slashed their dividends over COVID. AMCR has not done so, and it is the leader in the packaging industry. In addition, it's ROA and ROC are superior compared to the industry averages. I am fully convinced the packaging industry has more room to run from here, and that AMCR has a lot to offer me both in the way of returns and a solid income stream.
